name: vscode-w3cvalidation
description: Adds W3C validation support to Visual Studio Code.

vscode-w3cvalidation.javaHome.description:
Specifies the folder path to the JRE used to launch the W3C Validation Language Server.
For example "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk-11" (Windows)
 /usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64 (Ubuntu, etc.)

vscode-w3cvalidation.validator-token.description: Last-Modified, a timestamp, for the last release of war tag in the Nu Html Checker repository.

vscode-w3cvalidation.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the HTML validation language server.

scripts.postinstall: node setup_dev.mjs install && npm run service-updater
scripts.service-updater: npm run compile:updater && npm run updater:service
scripts.webpack:client: npm run compile:build && webpack --mode development --config-name client
scripts.webpack:server: npm run compile:build && webpack --mode development --config-name server
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile:build && npm run updater:service && webpack --mode production
